attributes.action: Reinstate the reduction in Council Tax for OAPs and increase their winter fuel allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before the 2005 General Election, OAPs were given a £200 reduction in their Council Tax.  This was only a one-off.  Many OAPs are going hungry to pay the Council Tax.  The £200 fuel allowance once covered 34 per cent of OAPs annual heating but now it covers only 19 per cent and needs to be increased or many will due this winter.
